name: OpenAIImageQueryScript
description: Sends a question and an image URL to OpenAI Vision API and returns a JSON response with keys 'result' (boolean) and 'comment' (string).

parameters.name: question
parameters.description: The question to ask about the image (e.g., 'Is there a cat in this image?').

parameters.name: imageUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the image to be analyzed by the OpenAI Vision API.
